tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE viewer_ratings (
    episode_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    rating FLOAT,
    viewer_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES episodes (id)
);

CREATE TABLE viewer_reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_id UUID,
    viewer_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES episodes (id)
);
CREATE TABLE Episodes (episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY, episode_name VARCHAR(255), season_number INT, episode_number INT, air_date DATE, duration INT);
CREATE TABLE Viewers (viewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), age INT, location VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE Ratings (rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY, episode_id INT, viewer_id INT, rating DECIMAL(2,1), review TEXT, rating_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Shows (show_id INT PRIMARY KEY, show_name VARCHAR(255), genre VARCHAR(255), year_started DATE, total_seasons INT);
CREATE TABLE ViewersToEpisodes (viewer_id INT, episode_id INT, watched BOOLEAN, PRIMARY KEY (viewer_id, episode_id));
